title: @riot: Stop saying the legacy skins will -never- be back then bring it back again
body:
This happened with:

1. Championship Riven
2. PAX Sivir

And now Urfwick? Seriously? 
Riot is sucking the value out of these rare, and exclusive skins. It's like a big fuck you to anyone who was a veteran or owner of a rare item.

Which skin is going to be next?

replies.body:
Limited*

Legacy skins have always been stated as things that will (potentially) return.
TOTALLY AGREE WITH YOU MAN! I own King Rammus... will be next? I HOPE NOT OR WILL STOP PLAY THIS GAME.
